wordGroup: infantry division 步兵师，陆军师；机步师

sentences.en: The Belgians fell back as the infantry came under fire.
sentences.cn: 比利时人在步兵部队遭到炮火袭击时撤退了。

sentences.en: A U.S. infantry battalion was marching down the street.
sentences.cn: 一个美军步兵营沿着街道行进。

sentences.en: The artillery has more firepower than the infantry.
